## Contents

- [1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info)
- [2 Spells](#Spells)
- [3 Tips & Tricks](#Tips_.26_Tricks)
- [4 History](#History)

## Useful Info

**Shadows** are [undead](/Undead "Undead") creatures which can briefly become [invisible](/Invisible "Invisible"). They can be found in the middle floors of the [Dungeon](/Dungeon "Dungeon")

When a shadow is invisible and not [backlit](/Backlit "Backlit"), it gains a boost to movement speed (14.2 [speed](/Movement#Monster_Speed "Movement")). Also, if the target cannot [see invisible](/See_invisible "See invisible"), an invisible shadow deals 2.5x damage, never misses, and reveals itself.

## Spells

| Spell set I |                                              |                                                      |
| :---------- | -------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1       | [Invisibility](/Invisibility "Invisibility") | [Natural flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |

## Tips & Tricks

- Shadows are fast-moving enemies that can deal extreme amounts of damage (35 dmg/hit), who also go invisible. Very strong for the places they apppear in.
- Being able to negate their invisibility is an obvious benefit. If you don't have see invisible already, pop on a [ring of see invisible](/Ring_of_see_invisible "Ring of see invisible") (if you have one).
  - Note that shadows are immune to [Sticky Flame](/Sticky_Flame "Sticky Flame") (they are [insubstantial](/Insubstantial "Insubstantial")) and aren't revealed from [shallow water](/Shallow_water "Shallow water") (they fly).

## History

- In [0.32](/0.32 "0.32"), shadows will be renamed to **shadowghasts**.
- Prior to [0.19](/0.19 "0.19"), players would summon [neutral](/Neutral "Neutral") shadows when wielding a [lantern of shadows](/Lantern_of_shadows "Lantern of shadows").
- Prior to [0.13](/0.13 "0.13"), shadows were unable to go invisible, and damaged your [strength](/Strength "Strength") when they attacked.

Speed 10
AC 7
EV 10
Will 40

Resistances rC+++
rPois+++
rDrown

A wisp of unliving shadow, slipping in and out of the darkness of the dungeon. It moves swiftly and silently from one pool of shade to another, striking unerringly from the blind spots of those who cannot see it.

“Between the idea
And the reality
Between the motion
And the act
Falls the Shadow
For thine is the Kingdom

Between the conception
And the creation
Between the emotion
And the response
Falls the Shadow
Life is very long”
-T.S. Eliot, “The Hollow Men”. 1925.

  • 1 Useful Info
  • 2 Spells
  • 3 Tips & Tricks
  • 4 History

Useful Info

Shadows are undead creatures which can briefly become invisible. They can be found in the middle floors of the Dungeon

When a shadow is invisible and not backlit, it gains a boost to movement speed (14.2 speed). Also, if the target cannot see invisible, an invisible shadow deals 2.5x damage, never misses, and reveals itself.

Spells

Spell set I
Slot1 Invisibility Natural flag

Tips & Tricks

  • Shadows are fast-moving enemies that can deal extreme amounts of damage (35 dmg/hit), who also go invisible. Very strong for the places they apppear in.
  • Being able to negate their invisibility is an obvious benefit. If you don't have see invisible already, pop on a ring of see invisible (if you have one).
    • Note that shadows are immune to Sticky Flame (they are insubstantial) and aren't revealed from shallow water (they fly).

History

  • In 0.32, shadows will be renamed to shadowghasts.
  • Prior to 0.19, players would summon neutral shadows when wielding a lantern of shadows.
  • Prior to 0.13, shadows were unable to go invisible, and damaged your strength when they attacked.
